item.title: List of Suggestions
item.dc:creator: Eran_Shmuel
item.description:
Priest
Night Ability: Channel: Use the primary power of a dead person. You can only use each corpse once, and you may not utilize Killer or Special classes. Unlimited uses.

I love it

Unseen and Cult may always speak to their allies at night, regardless whether they are dead or alive.

I don’t see the reason behind it, they are the only ones that can speak to each other while alive. it’s fun as a prince to tell somone my number before i execute them, or as a hunter to have a knight death note so evil won’t know my class after attacking me.

physician: Day Ability: Reanimate: Turn all dead Blue Dragon into Awakened Souls. 1 use. Give them all 2 charges of Dark Steel if they are already Awakened Souls. 2 uses, charge only used when successful.

Don’t like it at all.

Night Ability: Alter Link: Instantly add someone to the Astral Network. Will fail if they are another Mystic or part of another Astral Network. Maximum four people in the network. Will remove someone if they are already in the network. Unlimited uses, 1 day cool down.

Mystic is perfect as it is.

hunter: Day Ability: Wolf: Make someone bleed. They will die in two nights unless healed. 2 uses.

So the hunter will beome unconfirmable at night and confirmable at day in any unseen game. what’s the point? also, 2 nights for hunter is too slow.

merc: Guards no longer notify contract.

Incoming, kill every merc. merc are only confrimable if their target is confirmable, so now every merc should be executed because it’s a neut that only help bd if he is really a merc and his target is bd.

You no longer learn if you failed to occupy or redirect someone.

  1. its make the game boring for drunk and butlers
  2. it’s a big nerf that bd doesn’t need.

The Butler/Servant can bypass the occupy immunity of the Prince, Possessor, and Sorcerer the first time they occupy any of these classes.

I don’t like it at all. there is a reason those classes are occupy immune. Drunk can do it but with his secondery ability.

Read full topic

item.title: List of Suggestions
item.dc:creator: Htm
item.description:
NightX:

Priest

Blue Dragon Support

Passive: Call of the Dead: Speak to the dead at night.

Night Ability: Channel: Use the primary power of a dead person. You can only use each corpse once, and you may not utilize Killer or Special classes. Unlimited uses.

Night Ability: Infuse: Use the secondary power of a dead person. You may not utilize Killer or Special classes. 2 uses.

Soulcatcher

Unseen Support

Night Ability: Channel: Use the primary power of a dead person. You can only use each corpse once, and you may not utilize Killer or Special classes. Unlimited uses.

Night Ability: Infuse: Use the secondary power of a dead person. You may not utilize Killer or Special classes. 2 uses.

Priest imo should not be unique and it should have a very low chance of 2 spawning making it almost claimable sort of like medium in TOS

NightX:

Unseen and Cult may always speak to their allies at night, regardless whether they are dead or alive.

I feel like only certain unseen/cult members should be able to speak to their dead members like Soulcatcher, Ritualist, and CL/MM

NightX:

Day Ability: Reanimate: Turn all dead Blue Dragon into Awakened Souls. 1 use. Give them all 2 charges of Dark Steel if they are already Awakened Souls. 2 uses, charge only used when successful

This is a bit OP, also why is it a day ability?

NightX:

Awakened Soul
Blue Dragon Special

Passive: Undead

Night Ability: Dark Steel: Vote to kill a player. If they receive a majority of votes, they will be attacked. Ties result in inaction.

Not sure I like this, need to think about it

NightX:

Icy Touch Reverted.

Nooo! Not this!!!

NightX:

Ghostly Presence: If your attack fails, the player will not be notified.

This passive must be in the game!!!

NightX:

Mystic
Blue Dragon Social

Passive: Astral Network: You may speak anonymously to all linked players, and linked players may speak to each other. You will keep this if your class changes.

Day Ability: Telepathy

Day Ability: Focus Link: Reset the cool down for Alter Link. 2 uses.

Night Ability: Alter Link: Instantly add someone to the Astral Network. Will fail if they are another Mystic or part of another Astral Network. Maximum four people in the network. Will remove someone if they are already in the network. Unlimited uses, 1 day cool down.

Illusionist

Again I don’t like this, I personally can’t understand how it would work

NightX:

Blue Dragon Killer

Day Ability: Wolf: Make someone bleed. They will die in two nights unless healed. 2 uses.

Night Ability: Bear

Poacher
Unseen Offensive

Passive: Isolation

Day Ability: Lure: The Assassin’s poison will cause bleeding for today. 2 uses.

Night Ability: Spike Trap

Night Ability: Snare Trap

Again Retribution is something I like about hunter and isolation too, other than that I don’t have any problem

NightX:

Guards no longer notify contract.

NO! I do not understand why, you’re basically making merc claims instana kill, making them almost impossible to win

NightX:

You no longer learn if you failed to occupy or redirect someone.

Yes this is needed

NightX:

The Butler/Servant can bypass the occupy immunity of the Prince, Possessor, and Sorcerer the first time they occupy any of these classes.

NKs don’t need nerfs though I’d like to see prince losing occupation/target change immunity

item.title: List of Suggestions
item.dc:creator: RHCube
item.description:
NightX:

Night Ability: Alter Link: Instantly add someone to the Astral Network. Will fail if they are another Mystic or part of another Astral Network. Maximum four people in the network. Will remove someone if they are already in the network. Unlimited uses, 1 day cool down.

Illusionist shouldn’t have this. People won’t claim if they could be converted. I know that this psychic is for coordination, but they can’t coordinate if they don’t know what people are. Also remove the cooldown.

NightX:

You no longer learn if you failed to occupy or redirect someone.

No. I’ve already said why this shouldn’t happen. Butler would become even more boring.

NightX:

The Butler/Servant can bypass the occupy immunity of the Prince, Possessor, and Sorcerer the first time they occupy any of these classes.

No. The NK should never be nerfed. I agree that prince should lose occupation/redirection immunity though.
